name: The Big One: Lotto Systems Manager
overview: The BIG ONE Lotto Systems generator & manager is a must for anyone who plays Lotto. This is a professional Lotto systems research tool that gives you greater control over your Lotto investment. Features include: • Generates Systems Lotto games. • Generates unique minimum overlap systems. • Create a $300 system that assures a win. • Run your own syndicate size systems. • Make your own quick path system. • Enter your own systems for analysis. • Stores all systems to a data disk. • Checks any systems accurately against draws. • Lotto Draw Archive included and maintained. • Statistical analysis of any systems. • Output to screen or printer.
